Title: Bewitched, Bothered, and Belittled
Writer: Dan Fogelman (created by), Maggie Bandur, Jeremy Hall (story)
Actors: Joshua Sasse, Timothy Omundson, Vinnie Jones, Mallory Jansen
Plot: While continuing their quest to gather an army, King Richard discovers that he has a connection to Roberta, the beautiful warrior who volunteered to help. Galavant plays matchmaker. ...
